page.title: 15Blackridge Library
page.content: The{library}was opened in 1975 by our Regional Councillor William Drummond. At present the library has 667 members. On average each members takes 44{books}out in a year. This year the libraries output went up slightly because of unemployment. Every year a letter comes through our doors asking people who haven't joined to join. The{ library comprises of two sections,one for under fourteens and another for over fourteens. The librarian likes ordering new books and recommending books to readers. One librarian has been there for 23 years. She hates working late nights and on Saturdays. The other librarian has been there for 6 years. She likes reading books out of the library and she hates cheeky children.
